headline: Why Cardinal Health (CAH) Is Up 5.3% After Raising Full-Year Earnings Guidance Again And Boosting Buybacks
summary: In early February 2026, Cardinal Health reported past second-quarter fiscal 2026 results showing sales of US$65,627 million and net income of US$467 million, alongside higher earnings per share versus a year earlier and a second consecutive increase to its full-year earnings guidance. The company also completed US$1.48 billion of share repurchases under its ongoing program while highlighting profit growth across all five operating segments and benefits from its Solaris Health...
